com.microblink.uisettings

Class BaseOcrUISettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microblink.uisettings.UISettings
      • com.microblink.uisettings.BaseScanUISettings
        • com.microblink.uisettings.BaseOcrUISettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeepSoundUIOptions, CameraSettingsUIOptions, DebugImageListenerUIOptions, HelpIntentUIOptions, HighResSuccessFrameCaptureUIOptions, OcrResultDisplayUIOptions, SplashScreenUIOptions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentUISettings, PhotopayUISettings

    public abstract class BaseOcrUISettings
extends BaseScanUISettings
implements OcrResultDisplayUIOptions, HelpIntentUIOptions
    Base scan settings for OCR activities.

    • Method Detail

      • saveToIntent

        public final void saveToIntent(@NonNull
                               android.content.Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: UISettings
        Saves this scan activity settings to Intent so it can be passed to the corresponding scan activity. Intent target activity must be set before calling this method, and target activity must be compatible with this settings. DO NOT USE THIS METHOD UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING. Improper usage will crash your app.
        Overrides:
        saveToIntent in class BaseScanUISettings
        Parameters:
        intent - Intent to which this scan activity settings should be saved.

        Description copied from interface: HelpIntentUIOptions
        Defines intent for help activity called when help should be shown. If not set or set to null, help button will not be shown in the scanning UI.
        Specified by:

      • getHelpAction

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Runnable getHelpAction()
        Description copied from interface: HelpIntentUIOptions
        Returns the Runnable that will be invoked when user presses the help button on the scanning UI. For more information, see HelpIntentUIOptions.setHelpAction(Runnable).
        Specified by:
        getHelpAction in interface HelpIntentUIOptions
        Returns:
        the Runnable that will be invoked when user presses the help button on the scanning UI.

      • setHelpAction

        public void setHelpAction(@Nullable
                          java.lang.Runnable helpAction)
        Description copied from interface: HelpIntentUIOptions
        Defines action that will be executed when user presses the help button. If not set or set to null, pressing help button will invoke Intent set by HelpIntentUIOptions.setHelpIntent(Intent). If neither help Intent nor help action is set, help button will not be shown in the scanning UI. If both are set, then this action has priority, i.e. help intent set with HelpIntentUIOptions.setHelpIntent(Intent) will be ignored. Note that since Runnable cannot be serialized and transferred via Intent, this makes only sense if using RecognizerRunnerFragment with compatible overlay. An attempt to save to Intent using UISettings.saveToIntent(Intent), a IllegalStateException will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        setHelpAction in interface HelpIntentUIOptions
        Parameters:
        helpAction - Runnable that will be invoked when user presses the help button on the scanning UI.
